Key Match Events: Gleyber Torres roped a double on the first pitch of the game, followed by a Juan Soto RBI single
Torres drove in Anthony Volpe on a two on, two out single in the fifth inning
Giancarlo Stanton drove a ball 117 miles per hour into center field, scoring Aaron Judge
Post-Match Reflections: Gerrit Cole was thrilled in his ability to rise to the occasion and help his team clinch a spot in the ALCS
Aaron Boone said, 'But you get to this point, now we’ll be down to the final four.' Everyone is feeling pretty good about their teams. That’s the case for me.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The losing pitcher for the Royals was Michael Wacha, who also got the start
Luke Weaver recorded his third save of the playoffs
The score would remain 1-0 until the top of the fifth
A double play in the bottom half of the sixth caused both benches to clear, but cooler heads prevailed
The ALCS will begin on Monday night with the Yankees taking on either the Detroit Tigers or Cleveland Guardians
